question.title: RestTemplate, RestClient VS WebClient
question.body:
I have a Spring web application which does Http calls to external web services, for now it uses WebClient from webflux for making such calls, but every time it uses .block() since we don't need asynchronous processing:

public <T> T sendGetRequest(Class<T> responseType, URI uri) {
    return webClient.get().uri(uri)
            .headers(WebRequestUtil::setHeaders)
            .retrieve()
            .bodyToMono(responseType)
            .block();
}

So, the question is, since there are no async programming, isn't it better to use WebClient, or it is ok to use WebClient with .block()

I don't want to do micro optimizations, should I do refactoring?
